scripts.dev: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun next dev', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx next dev', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.lint: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun eslint --fix \"src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx eslint --fix \"src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.format: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun prettier --write \"src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx prettier --write \"src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.test: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun vitest --passWithNoTests --run', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx vitest --passWithNoTests --run', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.test:fast: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun vitest --passWithNoTests --run --no-threads', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx vitest --passWithNoTests --run --no-threads', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.test:coverage: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun vitest run --coverage --passWithNoTests', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx vitest run --coverage --passWithNoTests', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.test:e2e: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun cypress open', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx cypress open', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.typecheck: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck --jsx preserve --excludeDirectories .next && bunx --bun tsc -p cypress/tsconfig.json --noEmit', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck --jsx preserve --excludeDirectories .next && npx tsc -p cypress/tsconfig.json --noEmit', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.validate: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun npm-run-all --parallel \"test -- --run\" lint typecheck test:e2e', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx npm-run-all --parallel \"test -- --run\" lint typecheck test:e2e', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"

*.{ts,tsx}: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bunx --bun tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck --jsx preserve --excludeDirectories .next', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { require('child_process').execSync('npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck --jsx preserve --excludeDirectories .next', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
